create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts spiritual rap visual
Primary request: Contemporary spiritual rap visual at Rishikesh Lakshman Jhula bridge.
Scene/background: Rishikesh Lakshman Jhula suspension bridge above the Ganga in cinematic detail
Subject: iconic bridge silhouette, hillside temples, moving prayer flags
Action: 0-4s bridge wide reveal; 4-8s dynamic tracking along bridge cables; 8-12s aerial pullback over river
Camera: vertical drone-like rise with beat-synced cuts
Lighting/mood: late afternoon soft sunlight
Color palette: teal water, steel gray, saffron accents
Style/format: contemporary high-energy shorts style, cinematic realism, no text overlays
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no branded text, no identifiable real people, no copyrighted characters
Avoid: flicker, text artifacts, logos, watermark, deformed faces
